title: Semantik Architect  Frame Schema: Part–Whole / Composition Relation
description: JSON schema for the PartWholeCompositionFrame semantic structure used for part–whole and composition relations (e.g. country–regions, object–components).

frame_type.description: Stable frame identifier; must be "relation.part_whole" for part–whole / composition relation frames.

whole.description: The whole / container entity (e.g. a country, city, organization, physical object). Entity-like object, typically mirroring semantics.types.Entity (id, name, entity_type, extra, etc.).

parts.description: List of entities that are parts / components / subdivisions of the whole. Each item is an Entity-like object.

whole_role_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels describing the semantic role/type of the whole (e.g. "country", "city", "organ", "solar_system").

part_role_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels describing the semantic role/type of the parts (e.g. "region", "district", "department", "member_state").

relation_lemmas.description: Lemma-like labels describing the part–whole relation itself (e.g. "subdivision", "component", "member", "administrative_subdivision"). These correspond to constructions like "is divided into", "consists of", "is composed of".

attributes.description: Open-ended attribute map for additional structured facts about the relation itself (e.g. part_count, ordering, is_exhaustive). Keys should be strings.

extra.description: Free-form metadata bag for provenance, debug info, or original-source fields that are not directly interpreted by NLG.
